DOC.brief_summary: The purpose of this study is to assess the efficacy and safety of OPA-15406 ointment in patients with atopic dermatitis.
DOC.brief_title: Study of OPA-15406 Ointment in Patients With Atopic Dermatitis
DOC.criteria: Diagnosis of atopic dermatitis based on the criteria of Hanifin and Rajka Subjects who have an atopic dermatitis or contact dermatitis flareup defined as a sudden intensification of atopic dermatitis. Subjects who have an active viral skin infection. Subjects with a current or history of malignancy.
